scripts.test: npm run-script prepublish && mocha -R spec -f "without DB"
scripts.testWithDB: npm run-script initTestDB && npm run-script prepublish && mocha -R spec -f "with DB" && npm run-script clearTestDB
scripts.initTestDB: npm run-script clearTestDB && mongoimport -d test -c hrqTestData test/testdata.json --jsonArray
